resources.string:
If you are female, you must:
 Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 18 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 5 inch
Weigh at least 150 lbs.Avoid nicotine and alcohol use prior to your donation

If you are male, you must:
Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 18 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 1 inch 
Weigh at least 110 lbs.
Avoid nicotine and alcohol use prior to your donation

Giving plasma saves lives. The plasma you give is a lifeline in an emergency and for people who need Covid-19 treatments. Many people would not be alive today if donors had not generously given their plasma. 

Why we need you to give plasma?

 We need over 6000 blood donations every day to cure patients and treat them from the deadly Covid-19 disease.
Most people between ages of 18 to 65 are able to give plasma. Around half our current donors are over 45.That is why we need more young people to start giving plasma.

This is a demo projects on plasma donation and collecting. Our Team Members are: 
 1. Girik Garg
 2. Sanchita Bora 
 3. Anshika
 4. Charul 
 5. Medhansh Singh Verma
 6. Ramanjeet Singh
